scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud storage cp ./dist/assets/index.js $BUCKET/js/index.js --cache-control='no-cache' --content-type='text/javascript; charset=utf-8'
scripts.deploy:dev: BUCKET=gs://data-reporter-infographics/dev/2025-12-roundabouts npm run deploy && && gcloud storage cp index.dev.html $BUCKET/index.dev.html --cache-control='no-cache' --content-type='text/javascript; charset=utf-8'
